data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 1, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Queretaro close to the penalty box.
Queretaro pushes forward through Kevin Ramirez, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 5, Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 8, Queretaro drives forward and Angel Sepulveda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Queretaro.
Tijuana de Caliente's Luis Gamiz has been booked in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 9, Kevin Ramirez for Queretaro drives towards goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! Julian Velazquez gives Queretaro a 1-0 lead.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 11, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Queretaro's half.
In Santiago de Queretaro Queretaro attack through Javier Ibarra. The finish is off target, however.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Queretaro.
Luis Gamiz of Tijuana de Caliente smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Queretaro throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a throw-in for Queretaro, close to Tijuana de Caliente's area.
In the minute 17, Queretaro drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the away team a throw-in.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio La Corregidora.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 22, Attention is being given to Tijuana de Calienteâ€™s Victor Guzman and play has been suspended briefly.
Queretaro apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Angel Sepulveda but the ball hits the post!
Victor Guzman returns to the field for Tijuana de Caliente after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 23, Paolo Yrizar (Tijuana de Caliente) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 24, Free kick Queretaro.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gonzalo Montes.
In the minute 27, Queretaro's Gonzalo Montes is back in action after a slight knock.
Paolo Yrizar (Tijuana de Caliente) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Tijuana de Caliente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Queretaro's half?
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Jordan Silva (Tijuana de Caliente) gets a yellow card.
The away team has substituted Victor Guzman with Jorge Aguilar. Pablo Guede is thus making his first change.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 36, Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Tijuana de Caliente's Marcel Ruiz gets in a shot on goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 37, Irving Zurita of Queretaro gets in a strike, but is off target.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Queretaro.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 41, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Queretaro.
Throw-in Queretaro.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Queretaro close to the penalty box.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio La Corregidora.
In the minute 46, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 48, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the away team a throw-in.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Free kick Queretaro.
Goal! Queretaro increase their lead to 2-0 through a well-placed header from Hugo Silveira.
In the minute 51, Great play from Angel Sepulveda to set up the goal.
The away team replace Luis Gamiz with Christian Rivera.
Tijuana de Caliente make their third substitution with Vladimir Lorona replacing Jaime Gomez.
In the minute 54, The away team have replaced Paolo Yrizar with Fabian Castillo. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pablo Guede.
Pablo Guede is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio La Corregidora with Jordi Cortizo replacing Marcel Ruiz.
Tijuana de Caliente are back in the match in Santiago de Queretaro. Jordi Cortizo has scored to make it 2-1.
In the minute 55, David Barbona with an assist there.
Goal! Vladimir Lorona levels the match at 2-2.
Fabian Castillo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 60, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente are coming forward and Christian Rivera gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 62, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Omar Arellano is on a sub for Javier Ibarra for Queretaro.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
In the minute 68, Jordi Cortizo for Tijuana de Caliente gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
In the minute 70, Tijuana de Caliente are pushing forward but Vladimir Lorona's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Juan Pablo Meza is replacing Irving Zurita for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Jonathan Betancourt is replacing Hugo Silveira for the home team.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Queretaro a goal kick.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 75, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 79, Jonathan Betancourt for Queretaro has been booked by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre and receives a first yellow card.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Queretaro.
In the minute 80, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente just outside Queretaro's area.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 83, Jordi Cortizo (Tijuana de Caliente) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Queretaro's Jonathan Betancourt breaks free at Estadio La Corregidora. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Hector Altamirano (Queretaro) is making a fourth substitution, with Jose Ramirez replacing Angel Sepulveda.
In the minute 84, Queretaro make their fifth substitution with Kevin Escamilla replacing Gonzalo Montes.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Queretaro.
Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Queretaro throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
In the minute 88, Julio Nava gets his shot on target but fails to score for Queretaro.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Queretaro's Jonathan Betancourt is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santiago de Queretaro.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
